alert.note: Alert for Fisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fisher County through 800 PM CDT... At 656 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Hitson, or 8 miles northeast of Rotan, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamlin, Rotan, Roby, Sylvester, Longworth, Mccaulley, Hitson, Gannon, Busby and Capitola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
